content.rendered:
Directed by Petr Jákl

Written by Petr Jákl. Petr Jakl Sr.. Petr Bok. Marek Dobes. Michal Petrus. Kevin Bernhardt

Star Ben Foster(Jan Zizka). Sophie Lowe(Katherine). Michael Caine(Lord Boresh). Til Schweiger(Rosenberg). Roland Møller(Torak). Matthew Goode(King Sigismund). William Moseley(Jaroslav). Karel Roden(Wenceslas IV.). Werner Daehn(Ulrich). Vinzenz Kiefer(Conrad). Alistair Brammer(Freddy). Magnus Samuelsson(Lars). Christopher Rygh(Mick). Guy Roberts(Cyril). David Bowles(Giovanni). Jennifer Armour(Barbara). Jan Budar(Matthew). Aneta Kernová(Maria). Kevin Bernhardt(Captain Martin). Sean Connor Renwick(David). Zhang Lang(Zel). Ondrej Vetchý(Ondrej). Marek Vasut(King Wenceslas Chamberlain). Václav Jirácek(Zdenek). Martin Kavan(Oldrich). Derek Sotkowy(Prokop). Jake Zahradnik(Josef). Zdenek Gloser(Captain of the Guard). Laura Karolyi(Anna (14)). Roman Sebrle(Javier). Brian Caspe(Flashback Soldier #1). Petr Vágner(Flashback Soldier #2). Viktor Kristof(Jan Hus). Roman Dvorak(Cuman soldier #4). James Beaumont(Jan Hus (voice)). William Lizr(Nephew). Adam Spalenka(Young Jan Zizka). R. Scott Williams(Jan Zizkov’s Father). John Wolfe(Self – Mercenary)

Language English

Producers Martin J. Barab. Kevin Bernhardt. Pam Dixon. Cassian Elwes. Arianne Fraser. Petr Jakl Sr. Daniel Jaros. Petr Jákl. Alena Jáklová. Viktor Kristof. Stuart Manashil. Delphine Perrier

Production J.B.J. Film. Genesy. Double Tree Entertainment
